info.name: Tech Career Quiz
info.main: Confused about which tech career path to pursue? Find out which might be a good fit with this quiz!
info.results:
Learn More

questions.q: I have been professionally working for:
questions.incorrect: Awesome! It's the first letter of the alphabet. Did you actually go to kindergarden?

questions.q: My prior experience (school or work), has provided me with the following level of technology skills:
In my job I’m most interested in ______.

a.option: Finding fresh solutions to hard problems
Using facts, figures and logic to get things done
People! I am all about trying to understand the needs of users
Getting the project done efficiently, and on time!

questions.q: If you know it, tell us your Myers Brigg. Myers Brigg is just one way of describing personality, but we think it’s a fun way! Don’t forget, your Myers Brigg can change over the course of your life based on experiences. Neuroplasticity! You can take the test at 16 personalities: https://www.16personalities.com/personality-types

a.option: Working collaboratively on a team in an office
Working alone or remotely from home
Having the flexibility to work remotely or in a team
It depends on what I am working on

questions.q: I would prefer to work for:
I like to learn new information and how to complete a task:

a.option: By diving in and working hands on
By having someone tell or show me
By reading instructions and looking at graphics

questions.q: I work best when my supervisor:

a.option: Does not give me constant direction but checks ins from time to time
Gives me full autonomy over a task

questions.q: When I am given a new task or a problem to solve:

a.option: I like to draw diagrams and use sketches to find a solution
I like to fidget with the content or object to find a solution
I like to talk and rationalize my processes out loud to find a solution
